name: Getting rolled
description:
Getting rolled

This game was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022.

In this game you play a tank on a big dice. 

The big dice will roll a number and demons will crawl out of the diceholes.

Every game starts with rolling for your health.

The main goal is to survive as long as possible.

The longer you survive the harder it gets and the more enemies spawn and different enemies show up.

The game ends if your health reaches 0 or if you fall of the big dice.

Controls

  • W,A,S,D - Moving
  • Mouse - Aiming
  • Left-Click - Shooting

The sounds are from https://www.findsounds.com

Ps: this is my first game ever so sorry for the bad quality
